00019 class uParserBase
00020 {
00021     public :
00022     uParserBase();
00023     virtual ~uParserBase();

00026     virtual void init(std::istream* stream, bool header = false);
00027     virtual void init(const std::string& filename, const std::vector<std::string>& fieldsNames, char delimiter = '\t') { };
00028     virtual void init(std::istream* stream, const std::vector<std::string>& fieldsNames, char delimiter = '\t') { };

00030     uParserBase(const uParserBase&) = delete;

00054 //Thank you Stack Overflow for this basic structure
00055 
00056 template<typename T> uParserBase * createT() { return new T; }
00057 
00058 struct uParserBaseFactory {
00059     typedef std::map<std::string, std::function<uParserBase*()> > parser_map_type;
00060     virtual ~uParserBaseFactory(){};
00061     static std::shared_ptr<uParserBase> createInstance(std::string const& s) {
00062         parser_map_type::iterator it = getParserMap()->find(s);
00063 
00064       //  std::cout << getParserMap()->size() <<std::endl;
00065        //  parser_map_type::iterator temp= getParserMap()->begin();
00066       //   std::cout << it->first <<std::endl;
00067         if(it == getParserMap()->end()){
00068             throw uParser_exception_base()<<string_error("Asked for unregistered type, failling");
00069         }
00070       //  std::cerr << "Returning" <<std::endl;
00071         return std::shared_ptr<uParserBase>(it->second());
00072     }
00073 
00074 protected:
00075     static parser_map_type * mapItem;
00076     static parser_map_type * getParserMap()
00077     {
00078         if(!mapItem)
00079         {
00080             mapItem= new parser_map_type;
00081         }
00082         return mapItem;
00083     };
00084 
00085 };
00086 
00087 template<typename T>
00088 struct DerivedParserRegister : uParserBaseFactory
00089 {
00090     ~DerivedParserRegister(){};
00091     DerivedParserRegister(std::string const& s)
00092     {
00093         auto it = getParserMap()->find(s);
00094         if(it == getParserMap()->end())
00095         {
00096              getParserMap()->insert(std::pair<std::string, std::function<uParserBase*() >> (s, &createT<T>));
00097         }
00098         else
00099         {
00100             throw uParser_exception_base()<<string_error("Duplicated type registering in Parser, failling\n Type is:"+s+"\n");
00101         }
00102     }
00103 };
00104 }
